Text: I am moving this weekend and dont know when ill have reliable internet - but I will do my best to keep up with my series
Can't wait to see how this wraps up. Know if continuing series or one shot
Im interested too, i havent read this issue yet, but seems to be just starting
Oh man, I hope it continues. I LOVE violent comics like this.

It is going to continue.  If you pay attention to the author's statement at the end of the book (and the last page), it teases "The Legend of Luther Strode," although it doesn't say if that will be a second mini or a continuing.  But in either case, nothing until October if they stick to the schedule.
Wow... this was awesome, Thank you MrD
